channel.title: Maybe an error (ban)
channel.description: So two weeks have passed since Gravel_boy, friend of mine got banned, as tom said it was a two week ban for griefing. today i talked about it with tom and he unbanned him, but Gravel tried to log in and it says he's still banned. unban him again?

item.title: Maybe an error (ban)
item.dc:creator: @Nokturth Nokturth
item.description:
@Nokturth wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:435904”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=538620.msg3941242#msg3941242 date=1331428060]

i logged as gravel and it seems to work, nice.
thanks

but isnt the new ban system so that they can join just not do /login
[/quote]

That’s right.[/quote]

i don’t know because i don’t know gravel’s password, but before he told me that when he tried to join it said “griefing idiot”, and now i could join with his name
don’t know if he can login

Read full topic
